messages.subject: Re: god, the trinity and fathers
messages.msgSnippet: ... You personally find spiritual fulfillment differently......... I would suggest that the fact that it works for them makes it an equally valid path to
messages.messageBody:
>>I agree with Brenda........(some tidbits)
You personally find spiritual fulfillment differently.........
I would suggest that the fact that it works for them makes it an equally
valid path to spiritual fulfillment.
Please don't judge my choice of path.>>

One of my favorite quotes:

"The surest obstacle on the path to the Divine is the arrogant belief that
there is but one route and yours is the only map." -J.D. Gold

Life is good.
~Mary
